title: Creative Content Designer (must include visual portfolio)
job_overview:
Remote, Full Time:
USD $1,200–1,500/month (approx. $7–9/hr depending on skill)

We’re looking for a visually sharp, fast-moving creative to help grow brands through content that actually lands.

You’ll work across multiple creator-led and consumer brands making everything from IG Reels and email banners to social content packs and trend-based posts. You don’t need to be an AI expert, but you should be curious and confident using tools like Higgsfield.ai, CapCut, and Midjourney/GPT, plus strong skills in Canva and/or Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator.

What You’ll Be Doing:
-Create short-form video and static content for IG, TikTok, email, and ads
-Build and manage social content packs and calendars
-Track trends and generate reactive, relevant content
-Work fast, take feedback, and collaborate with a Creative Director

Must-Haves:
-Strong visual taste (if your work’s mid, it won’t fly)
-A sharp portfolio (content, edits, social posts. We want to see your taste)
-Tools: Higgsfield.ai, Canva, CapCut, Photoshop. Bonus if you're AI-curious (Midjourney, GPT, etc.)
-In tune with platform trends and internet culture
-Able to deliver 15–20 high-quality pieces per week

To Apply:
-Drop your portfolio
-Share 2–3 brands you think are visually on point

Shortlisted applicants will complete a paid trial task
